plot outline: Dhoblewadi a small town in Satara has a school which has about 15 students and on the verge of shutting down due to poor attendance of the students.In order to keep the school running the number should quickly rise to 35.School and kids are benefited by Mastar's teachings but have no support of the villagers and Sarpanch.While school faces problems when Mastar goes on emergency leave.
title: Ubuntu
plot: When the elders of the town plan to shut down the local school, a handful of students and their sincere teachers revolt to keep the classes going.

Dhoblewadi a small town in Satara has a school which has about 15 students and on the verge of shutting down due to poor attendance of the students.In order to keep the school running the number should quickly rise to 35.School and kids are benefited by Mastar's teachings but have no support of the villagers and Sarpanch.While school faces problems when Mastar goes on emergency leave.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
